name: download_image
description: An image that displays the piece of content that a user would download on the thank you page.

name: heading
description: A heading that describes the page, which is intended to allow the user to download a piece of content.

name: subheading
description: A short one sentence tagline that goes below the main heading of the page and above the content.

name: description
description: A paragraph that provides some details about the content that the user can download.

name: button_text
description: The button text that describes the call to action the user should take which is downloading a piece of content.

name: button_link
description: The URL that a user should be taken to when they click the call to action for downloading a piece of content.
